text: (On the day when ye behold it) when you see it upon the first blowing of the Trumpet, (every nursing mother will forget) will be preoccupied from (her nursling and every pregnant one will be delivered of her burden) of pregnancy, (and thou (Muhammad) wilt see mankind) standing and (drunken, yet they will not be drunken) from intoxicants, (but the Doom of Allah will be strong (upon them)) this is why they were dazzled as if they were drunk.
